Articles.Content:
Went to see the fly bys and landing of the last flight of Discovery.

https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.3457665114697.2142778.1062953631&type=3&l=110d487eca
Stuff like that never flies over me. :C

Where did you film that at cBBp?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
at the shuttles new home. the air and space museum near Dulles international airport

Oh sweet! Were you at Udvar-Hazy or nearby somewhere else? I\'m only about 40 min from Dulles and was thinking of heading over there, but I didn\'t have the gas and I was worried I wouldn\'t find a free place to park. LOL

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Nice shot! That\'s a awesome shuttle!

Oh sweet! Were you at Udvar-Hazy or nearby somewhere else? I\'m only about 40 min from Dulles and was thinking of heading over there, but I didn\'t have the gas and I was worried I wouldn\'t find a free place to park. LOL

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

yeah I was right at it. There is a hill right after the toll booth and i was right on that.

The one at the end of the Greenway? Fooking awesome! Were there a lot of cars on the side of the road?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

The one at the end of the Greenway? Fooking awesome! Were there a lot of cars on the side of the road?

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

IDk I was there at 7:45. they were only letting in 2000 cars. after it landed at 10:58 we got to our car by 11:00 and there were so many cars outside on the road leading and on the toll road that it took till 11:30 for the cars in the lot to start moving.

I saw in youtube videos both shoulders were packed with cars.

CPT. you know on monday in the early morning it will be taking off with enterprise heading to NYC. probably at 7am. you should beable to see it from atop the garages at dulles.

I wish I could, don\'t have the gas or money.

I might be able to see it from my house though as the flight path from Dulles to NY is pretty much right over here.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

why you so poor?

Because I don\'t have money. S:|

8)

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Well, it\'d cost me $4400 just to get there, not counting food, accomodation and my trip home . .
I thought the shuttle already had its last flight...

I thought the shuttle already had its last flight...

You might wanna look a little closer at the video
